ru.rosroble.client.management

Class CollectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.rosroble.server.CollectionManager

  • public class CollectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to make operations on the collection. Contains methods, which are executed after CommandProcessor request.

    • Constructor Summary

      CollectionManager()

      • showCollection

        public void showCollection()
        Shows the objects stored in collection with short description.

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String name,
                double price,
                boolean isRefundable,
                boolean ifMax)
        Adds an object to a collection interactively.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of an object
        price - The price of an object
        isRefundable - Refundability of an object
        ifMax - If true the object will be added only if it's greater than the max one in the collection. Needed for "add_if_max" command

      • load

        public void load()
        Reads and loads the collection from the XML-File via FileManager.

      • updateId

        public void updateId(long id)
        Consequently updates all the fields of an object with id specified. Asks user if they wish to update the field.
        Parameters:
        id - - id of an object to update.

      • removeById

        public void removeById(long id)
        Parameters:
        id - Id of an object to be removed.

        public void clear()
        Clears the collection

        public void saveToFile()
        Saves the collection to XML-File via FileManager

      • removeLower

        public void removeLower()
        Asks the user to input the object and removes all the objects which are lower (according to compareTo() method)

      • sort

        public void sort()
        Sorts the collection.

      • removeByRefundable

        public void removeByRefundable(boolean refundable)
        Removes first occurrence of an object with stated "refundable" param from the collection
        Parameters:
        refundable - value of a "refundable" field to search for
